dmca.title: http://www.okflashgames.com/article/html/article_501.html - "Prison Break"
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Fox Intellectual Property [mailto:FOXIP@fox.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 08, 2006 8:27 PM
To: Legal Response
Cc: Jason Zedeck
Subject: http://www.okflashgames.com/article/html/article_501.html -
"Prison Break"


<http://www.okflashgames.com>
c/o
Andrea Almeida
Associate General Counsel
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Fwy., Suite 110
Dallas, Texas  75207
 
Via e-mail to legal-response@theplanet.com
<mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com> 
 
Dear Ms. Almeida:
 
On behalf of Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation and/or its
subsidiaries and affiliated companies (hereinafter collectively referred
to as "Fox"), I am writing to notify ThePlanet.com Internet Services,
Inc. (hereinafter "ThePlanet.com") of infringement of Fox's intellectual
property rights in and to it television series, "Prison Break" on the
website located at 
http://www.okflashgames.com/article/html/article_501.html to request
that ThePlanet.com take immediate action to stop such infringement.
Attached please find a PDF copy of the images at issue.
 
Fox is the owner of exclusive rights protected under copyright law and
other intellectual property laws in and to the images at issue.
 
The undersigned has a good faith belief that use of the materials in the
manner described herein on the infringing Web Page is not authorized by
Fox, its agent or the law.  The information in this notice is accurate.
Under penalty of perjury, the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf
of Fox with respect to this matter.
 
We appreciate your prompt attention to this important matter.
 
This letter is not a complete statement of Fox's rights in connection
with this matter, and nothing contained herein constitutes an express or
implied waiver of any rights, remedies, or defenses of Fox in connection
with this matter, all of which are expressly reserved.
 
Best regards.
 
Robin Baker
Paralegal
Intellectual Property Department
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
(O) (310) 369-3865
